Favorite types of food, ranked:

I'm pretty excited to move to SF this summer for DBC but I have no idea where I will be living yet.

In the summer of 2012 I took the trip of a lifetime, backpacking South East Asia with my sister and brother in law. A highlight of my life was the chance to ride an elephant.

Click my picture for more info on Asian Elephants!


If I'm stressed I like to look at this picture and remember how great it felt to ride through the countryside without a care in the world.
